articles.title: Fawad Khan, Sanam Saeed's Zindagi Gulzar Hai is back on TV. Can't wait, say fans - India Today
articles.description: Fawad Khan and Sanam Saeed-starrer Zindaug Gulzar Hai is set to return to Indian television. The show along with other Pakistani shows will air on Zee Zindagi from May 23.

articles.title: Amul pays heartfelt tribute to Soumitra Chatterjee and Swatilekha Sengupta as their film Belashuru releases - India Today
articles.description: Dairy brand Amul paid a heartfelt tribute to late actors Soumitra Chatterjee and Swatilekha Sengupta as their film Belashuru released in the theatre last week.

articles.author: Janhvi Sharma
articles.title: Cannes 2022: Deepika Padukone's retro look and Aditi Rao Hydari's regal look from the grand event will make y - Bollywood Life
articles.description: Deepika Padukone and Aditi Rao Hydari's sixth day look at the Cannes 2022 will make you fall in love with their fashion choices. Deepika's retro look and Aditi's majestic look has set the temperature soaring.
articles.content: She completed her retro look with silver accessories including a chain, hoop earrings, and a bracelet. She styled her messy hair into a ponytail and added glam to her look by wearing white stilettoes.
